title: "A good egg: Robot chef trained to make omelettes"
excerpt: "A team of engineers have trained a robot to prepare an omelette, all the way from cracking the eggs to plating the finished dish, and refined the 'chef's' culinary skills to produce a reliable dish that actually tastes good."
